title: Fight Song
content:
A true masterpiece of a music video that's worth your time, even if the title itself is about as uninspired as a rock sitting on the ground. But who cares about the title when the visuals are nothing short of stunning? This music video for Eve's song "Fight Song" is the 12th ending to the fan-favorite series, Chainsaw Man. Now, I know what you're thinking, another Chainsaw Man banger? Get ready to be blown away because this is not just any ordinary ending, it's a brutal, demonic, and gory work of art that goes hand-in-hand with the show's grim themes. The color red dominates thescreen and really makes an impact.

Now, I know that as a music video, it may be a little underwhelming to some, but let me tell you, the visuals alone make up for the lack of fire in the song. It's like a visual feast, and you'll be begging for an anime focused on the two main characters and their little girl companion. It's like a new take on Denji and Pochita, and let me tell you, it's a delightful one. So, if you're a fan of gore, animation, or just great music videos in general, Fight Song is the one for you. I highly recommend you give it a watch.
